channel.title: 562 Drops don't work
channel.description:
Hi. In my 562 server loading 641 it seems that NPC drops don't work. I have looked at the tables and tried killing beasts that have a 100% drop rate of coins but they only drop bones.
Base: RS2HD Source: Mezzyscape
